definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import pilc ds.result = pilc.triggermode_cb(commonblock, "$(name)", ds.$(name)_triggermode, ds.$(name)_nbtriggers, ds.$(name)_triggerperfile, "$(hostname)", "$(device)", "$var.filename", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno", "$(__insname__)", ds.$(name)_fileprefix, ds.$(name)_filedir)
$datasources.$(name)_triggermode $datasources.$(name)_nbtriggers $datasources.$(name)_triggerperfile $datasources.$(name)_filprefix $datasources.$(name)_fildir
